welcome_message_body: Welcome to Skien, Norway â€“ a charming and historic city known for its beautiful nature and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to take in all its beauty and explore everything it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Skien Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Skien Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sandefjord Airport handles all domestic and international flights.
